welcome.subject: Welcome to E-Course, {{name}}!
welcome.message: Thank you for joining E-Course! We're excited to have you as part of our learning community. Here are some things you can do to get started:
welcome.feature3: Connect with instructors and other learners
welcome.support: If you need any help, feel free to contact our support team.

verification.subject: Verify Your Account
verification.title: Hello {{name}}!
verification.message: Thank you for registering. Please click the link below to verify your email:
verification.expiry: This link will expire in 24 hours.

resetPassword.subject: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.title: Hello {{name}}!
resetPassword.message: You have requested to reset your password. Click the link below to continue:
resetPassword.expiry: This link will expire in 1 hour.
resetPassword.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email.

studyReminder.subject: Study Reminder
studyReminder.title: Hello {{name}}!
studyReminder.message: We noticed you haven't accessed "{{courseName}}" for {{days}} days.
studyReminder.motivation: Maintain regular study habits to achieve the best results!

newMessage.subject: New Message
newMessage.title: Hello {{name}}!
newMessage.message: You have a new message from {{sender}} in "{{chatRoom}}"

verificationOTP.subject: Account Verification
verificationOTP.title: Hello {{name}}!
verificationOTP.message: Your OTP for account verification is:
verificationOTP.expiry: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
verificationOTP.ignore: If you didn't request this code, please ignore this email.

resetPasswordOTP.subject: Password Reset OTP
resetPasswordOTP.title: Hello {{name}}!
resetPasswordOTP.message: Your OTP code for password reset is: {{otp}}
resetPasswordOTP.warning: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
resetPasswordOTP.footer: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.

verificationReminder.subject: Reminder: Verify Your Account
verificationReminder.title: Hello {{name}},
verificationReminder.message: We noticed you haven't verified your account yet.
verificationReminder.action: Please click the link below to verify:
verificationReminder.expiry: Note: The link will expire 48 hours after registration.

otpReminder.subject: Reminder: OTP Verification
otpReminder.title: Hello {{name}},
otpReminder.message: We noticed you haven't verified your OTP yet.
otpReminder.action: Please enter the OTP sent earlier to complete registration.
otpReminder.resend: If you haven't received the code, you can request a new one.
otpReminder.expiry: Note: OTP will expire 24 hours after registration.
